page.title: 11The Parish Council Personnel
page.content: The{Chairman}of Bartley Parish Council is Mr Derek Carter who is also Headmaster of Calmore Middle School. He has been Chairman for 3 years. He has also been a District Councillor. He thinks that the job of the council is to tell the more important District and County Councils what the people want. The Parish Council itself has few{Powers.} Mr Carter says that it is his job to stop people from talking on one Subject too long and sending other people to sleep. The bit of the job he likes best is meeting people, the bit of the job he likes least is when people become unpleasant at meetings. The Chairman has no Chain of Office or special robes, but he does have a paid clerk ( part-time, not elected ) to help him run the meetings. Mr Carter has once been asked to open a caravan and camping rally.
